item.name: cards
deck
{type}
{id}
Add the specified card to the specified deck

request.description: Add the specified card to the specified deck

response.name: Card added
response.body:
{
  "id": 3,
  "title": "Black Monday",
  "epoch": "Pre",
  "description": "US and EU lose supremacy on all NWO economy slots.",
  "points": 2,
  "faction": "E",
  "type": "Economy",
  "remove": true,
  "image": "images/blackMonday.jpg",
  "background": "#DDDDFF",
  "year": "esse Duis dolore in",
  "subtype": ""
}
